name: Klee
storytext: Every card you draw may bring an "explosive surprise."
source: Reward for inviting Klee to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Explosive Spark</color>.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113063]</color> at the opponent's play area.
